original_text: and who has also put his seal on us and given us his Spirit in our hearts as a guarantee.
korean_text: 그가 또한 우리에게 인치시고 보증으로 우리 마음에 성령을 주셨느니라

sentences.original_text: who has also put his seal on us
and given us his Spirit in our hearts
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리 마음에 그의 영을 주셨습니다
